      • assignContinentToNeighbors

        public static java.util.HashMap<riskModels.country.Country,java.util.List<riskModels.country.Country>> assignContinentToNeighbors(java.util.List<riskModels.country.Country> countryAndNeighbors)
        This method will assignContinent to Neighbor countries
        Parameters:
        countryAndNeighbors - It is same List returned while reading [Territories] part
        Returns:
        HashMap ,Which will have Country as a key and List of Country (neighbors) as a Value.it will help to create graph

      • readContinents

        public static java.util.List<riskModels.continent.Continent> readContinents(java.io.BufferedReader bufferReaderForFile)
        This method will read the continet part of map file
        Parameters:
        bufferReaderForFile - BufferReader object that read the .map file for continent
        Returns:
        List of Continent. every single object of the list contains continentName and number of countries it hold.
